contest-event.event-date:
July 8, 1950 D Northallerton Contest (Open Section)
Northallerton Contest (Open Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
northallerton-contest-open-section
None
Northallerton, North Yorkshire Hymn tune contest - 1st Blackhall, 2nd Crookhall, 3rd Thornley. Best cornet C.Sayers, best horn G.Dawson, best euphonium J.Marsh, best trombone A.Bird (not known which bands they played for. Prizes - 1st £20 and bowl, 2nd £10, 3rd £5. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 21, 2014, 12:52 p.m. Oct. 7, 2019, 11:08 a.m.
